Description: Textile fragment woven in silk; decorated parallel lines and bands in different shades of blue, yellow and brown; glued on a piece of cardboard; label attached reading 'Piece of Arab fabric from Egypt, 10th-12th century. Given by M. Sasson, 1916.' Warp: silk, brown, I, 24/cm Weft: silk, yellow, blue and brown, I, 72/cm
